name: py-gevent
description: gevent is a coroutine-based Python networking library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-cffi
dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code

dependencies.name: py-zope-interface
dependencies.description:
This package provides an implementation of "object interfaces" for
Python. Interfaces are a mechanism for labeling objects as conforming to
a given API or contract. So, this package can be considered as
implementation of the Design By Contract methodology support in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-grequests
dependent_to.description:
GRequests allows you to use Requests with Gevent to make asynchronous
HTTP Requests easily. Note: You should probably use requests-threads or
requests-futures instead.

dependent_to.name: py-gdbgui
dependent_to.description: gdbgui is a modern, free, browser-based frontend to gdb
